divs: sighting detailsi was sitting on my balcony, looking up at the sky, as i usually do. i've always figured that most people don't see ufos because most people don't look up at the sky. i've done this for most of my life and have only ever seen a ufo twice (this occasion being only the second). in any case, just as i looked up, nearly directly overhead, i saw a very brilliant flash that grew more luminous over a period of about 5 seconds. it was moving, but not very rapidly, even as the light was intensifying, and appeared to be much higher than any passenger airplane flies. from my perspective, it appeared to move at about 1 cm per second. the light was bright white and grew in intensity until it was about as bright as a full moon on a clear night, but only a small fraction of its size. while it was brightly luminescent, it appeared about 10 times as large as the largest star in the sky and equally as bright (ten times as bright as the brightest star in the sky). after it reached its climax in intensity, it faded to a luminescence equivalent to about that of the average star's intensity. it continued to move toward the south, but appeared to ascend to an elevation well beyond that of a commercial aircraft, and did so much more quickly than anything i've seen in the sky. as it ascended and continued southward, it faded progressively. just before it faded out of sight, it made a sharp ~10��� turn to the left and then faded from view after about another 10 seconds. the entire incident endured for about 45 seconds. while it moved more rapidly than anything i've ever seen in the sky (taking into account its apparent elevation), it didn't move like a bullet or take-off so rapidly that i'd have missed it if i'd blinked, as i've heard described in so many other testimonies. very exciting and, although it was much too far away to see any details, i'm, personally, convinced that what i saw was a ufo that was, also, of extraterrestrial origin (both terms used in their literally\denotatively).
Summary: VERY Bright Illumination and Sharp Turning UFO
